results.description: The Ligue 1 derby between Nice and Marseille is suspended following homophobic chants by a section of supporters.
results.title: Homophobic chants halt Ligue 1 game between Nice and Marseille

results.description: Former Chelsea and Tottenham manager Andre Villas-Boas is appointed head coach of French club Marseille.
results.shortTitle: Marseille name Villas-Boas as head coach
results.title: Andre Villas-Boas appointed Marseille head coach

results.description: Rudi Garcia will step down as Marseille manager at the end of the season after failing to claim a European spot.
results.title: Rudi Garcia to leave as Marseille manager at end of season

results.description: Lionel Messi scores a stunning hat-trick against Real Betis as Barcelona move 10 points clear in La Liga.
results.shortTitle: Messi scores a hat-trick as Barca move 10 points clear
results.title: Real Betis 1-4 Barcelona in La Liga - Messi scores a hat-trick

results.description: Mario Balotelli becomes the first player in 45 years to score in his first four Marseille Ligue 1 home games - with the only goal against his former club Nice.
results.shortTitle: Balotelli scores against old team Nice
results.title: Marseille 1-0 Nice: Mario Balotelli scores against his former team

results.description: Mario Balotelli scores for Marseille and uploads his celebrations with team-mates to his Instagram story.
results.title: Mario Balotelli: Striker scores overhead kick for Marseille and films celebrations on his phone

results.description: Mario Balotelli scores for the third time in four games for Marseille to help them to a home Ligue 1 win over Amiens.
results.title: Marseille 2-0 Amiens: Mario Balotelli scores third goal in four games

results.description: YouTuber and Marseille fan Mohamed Henni tells BBC World Service that he breaks TVs when his football team loses "to make people happy".
results.shortTitle: The fan who smashes his TV when his team loses
results.title: The Marseille fan who smashes his TV when his team loses

results.description: Marseille win for the first time at home since November as they beat Bordeaux 1-0 in a Ligue 1 match played behind closed doors.
results.title: Marseille 1-0 Bordeaux: Stade Velodrome has no fans watching as hosts win

results.description: Marseille will play their upcoming home fixtures behind closed doors while the LFP investigates their league defeat by Lille.
results.shortTitle: Marseille to play behind closed doors
results.title: Marseille to play behind closed doors while LFP investigate firework incident

thumbnail.altText: Marseille players take cover from firework

results.description: Mario Balotelli's Marseille debut ends in defeat in a match held up for 31 minutes after a firework thrown by a fan explodes close to players.
results.title: Marseille 1-2 Lille

results.description: Former Manchester City and Liverpool striker Mario Balotelli completes a move to Marseille from Nice.
results.title: Mario Balotelli completes transfer to Marseille from Nice

results.description: Former Manchester City and Liverpool striker Mario Balotelli is set to join Marseille from fellow Ligue 1 side Nice.
results.shortTitle: Nice's Balotelli set for Marseille move
results.title: Mario Balotelli set to join Marseille from Nice

results.description: Cesc Fabregas makes his Monaco debut as Thierry Henry's side hold Marseille to a draw in Ligue 1.
results.shortTitle: Fabregas makes Monaco debut in draw
results.title: Marseille 1-1 Monaco: Cesc Fabregas makes debut in draw

thumbnail.altText: Cesc Fabregas in action for Monaco against Marseille at the Stade Velodrome

results.description: Marseille suffer an embarrassing defeat in the French Cup as they are beaten by fourth-division Andrezieux.
results.title: Andrezieux-Boutheon 2-0 Marseille: Fourth-tier side stun top-flight Marseille

results.description: Three more Ligue 1 games this weekend are postponed amid fears of more violent "yellow vest" protests in France over rising living costs.
results.title: France protests: Three more Ligue 1 games postponed, including Monaco v Nice

results.description: Kylian Mbappe scores as Paris St-Germain beat rivals Marseille equalled Tottenham's record of 11 consecutive wins at the start of a league season.
results.shortTitle: Mbappe sends PSG to record-equalling win
results.title: Marseille 0-2 Paris St-Germain: Kylian Mbappe sends PSG to record-equalling win

results.description: Netherlands midfielder Kevin Strootman has joined Marseille from Roma in a €25m (£22.7m) deal.
results.title: Roma's Kevin Strootman joins Marseille for £22m

results.description: Dimitri Payet is the beneficiary as VAR is used for the first time in French football in Marseille's opening-day win over Toulouse.
results.shortTitle: Payet scores first Ligue 1 VAR penalty
results.title: Dimitri Payet: Marseille midfielder scores first VAR penalty in Ligue 1
